info.name: UniZ Ultimate Production Collection v2
info.description: Complete Production API Suite for UniZ Microservices Ecosystem. Supports Auth, Profile, Outpass, Academics, Files, and Administration.

query.description: Optional: Admin can view any student's grades

request.description: Fetches student grades with dynamic GPA calculation. Marks status as FAILED if 'R' grades are present.

query.description: Optional: Admin can view any student's attendance

request.description: Fetches student attendance with automatically calculated percentages and semester-wise summaries.
Updates multiple student grades in one call. Useful for re-examinations or quick corrections. Accepts numeric or character grades.

item.name: Add New Subject (Upsert) Also can edit

request.description: Creates or updates a subject. If a subject with the same 'code' exists, it will be updated.
Upload the filled Excel template. Supports 'Total Classes Occurred' and 'Total Classes Attended' columns. Updates existing records (upsert).
Upload the filled Excel template. Supports both numeric (0-10) and character grades (EX, A, B, C, D, E, R). Updates existing records (upsert).

query.description: Optional: Filter by specific semester (e.g., SEM-1, SEM-2)

request.description: Fetches a bulk view of grades (or failures) for a branch/year. returns a 'students' array where each entry contains the student's profile details and a list of their specific records.
Downloads an Excel template for attendance. Automatically generates rows for ALL subjects matching the branch and year.

query.description: If true, returns only students who have an 'R' grade in a specific subjectCode.

request.description: Downloads an Excel template for grading. Supports character grades: EX, A, B, C, D, E, R. If subjectCode is omitted, it generates a multi-subject template for the entire branch.
Global endpoint to monitor the latest academic upload progress (Grades or Attendance).
